regen.absent_element: situation where non-lead cab drivers request reestablishment of the call
regen.new_specification: If the call fails to any non-lead cab, the driver in that cab shall call the lead cab to request reestablishment of the call.

label: If the call fails to any other cab, the driver in that cab will call the lead cab and request re-establishment of the call.
absence: situation of call failure in other cabs(not the lead traction vehicle)
